name: Missing Exhibits - Chapter 3
description:
Missing Exhibits is a short, retro-looking 3d adventure game.

Some museum items went missing recently. The media suspects some local thieves. Your task is to keep your eyes on the exhibits during night, while collecting the trash left by guests.

CONTROLS:

Mouse: Look

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Right Click: Turn torchlight on/off

Left click: Use object
